data.scheme_name: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Udhyog Uday Yojana for SC/ST Entrepreneurs for MSME - Assistance for Power Connection Charges - SC/ST - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides assistance @ 50% of charges paid to distribution licenses for LT/HT service line, maximum limit up to Rs. 5 lakh
data.eligibility: MSME located in other than Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation (GIDC)/approved industrial park area, which has paid charges to distribution licensee, for new connection or to get additional load in case of existing consumer (in case of expansion) or for shifting of connection or service line, will be eligible for assistance.
data.conditions:
1. MSME manufacturing enterprise has to apply for reimbursement within one year from date of payment of charges to Distribution Licensee for service line
  2. Application under this scheme will be sanctioned & disbursed by concern DIC office
  3. Enterprise should have obtained Distribution License for service line during the operative period of the scheme
  4. The Enterprise is eligible for maximum three applications with total assistance of maximum Rs.5.00 lakh during operative period of the scheme.
data.beneficiaries: MSME located in other than Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation (GIDC)/approved industrial park area, which has paid charges to distribution licensee, for new connection or to get additional load in case of existing consumer (in case of expansion) or for shifting of connection or service line, will be eligible for assistance.
data.prerequisites:
1. MSME manufacturing enterprise has to apply for reimbursement within one year from date of payment of charges to Distribution Licensee for service line
  2. Application under this scheme will be sanctioned & disbursed by concern DIC office
  3. Enterprise should have obtained Distribution License for service line during the operative period of the scheme
  4. The Enterprise is eligible for maximum three applications with total assistance of maximum Rs.5.00 lakh during operative period of the scheme.
data.context: The primary mission of The Industrial Policy 2020 includes support for development of MSMEs., focus on Export Competitiveness: Vocal for Local to become Global and thus integrated value chains across product segments.
data.objective: To provide assistance to MSMEs for the power connection charges paid
data.description:
1. For SC/ST Entrepreneurs Assistance @ 50% of charges paid to distribution licenses for LT/HT service line, maximum limit up to Rs. 5 lakh during policy period
  2. The eligible expenditure includes charges/expenses paid to the power distribution licensee (except refundable deposit), for new connection or additional load in case of existing consumer (in case of expansion) or for shifting of connection or service line.
data.how_to_apply: Enterprise has to apply online on IFP Portal (https://ifp.gujarat.gov.in) and hard copy at concern DIC office within one year from the date of payment of charges to Distribution Licensee for service line.
data.funding_facilitator: Industries and Mines Department, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: The assistance will be release after the training session.
data.additional_info: The enterprise that has availed assistance under this component cannot avail assistance under any other scheme of other department of state government for the same component providing similar benefit. However, Enterprise can avail under such schemes of Government of India, if any.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Signed copy of Application form* 
2. Copy of Udyam Registration (if applicable) 
3. Copy of the Constitution of the enterprise 
4. Copy of PAN Card of Enterprise 
5. Copy of PAN Card of Applicant/Promoters/Directors/partners and authorised signatory 
6. CA certificate for capital investment 
7. Land Document such as Non-Agricultural Permission/ copy of Index/sale deed 
8. Estimates of Power Distribution company (DISCOM) and receipt 
9. Copy of bills issued by Power Distribution company 
10. Copy of Power Distribution License company Certificate (High Tension / Low Tension) 
11. Copy of certificate for social category (if applicable) 
12. Copy of CA Certified Balance Sheet of the latest (if applicable) 
13. Copy of CA certified Shareholding pattern 
14. Copy of sanctioned and connected Load Certificate issued by Power Distribution License Company 
15. Self-certified expenditure statement supported by DISCOM documents 
16. Copy of Gujarat Pollution Control Board approved NOC/Consent & other departments approval (if applicable) 
17. Bank details for payment (Cancelled cheque) 
18. Copy of GST registration (if applicable) 
19. Self-Attested documents/ details to be submitted by the Authorized Person 
20. Power of attorney/Board resolution/ Consent letter 
21. Supporting documents for SC/ST Enterprise
data.checklist_info_d:
Address:
Jadeja Dharmendrasinh, 
Commissioner of Industries (MSME Incentive),
4th Floor, Block No. 1, Udyog Bhavan, Sector 11, 
Gandhinagar-382010

For other addresses visit- https://msmec.gujarat.gov.in/districtindustrieslist
